product.name: Cheeseburger
product.description: The classic choice! A mouthwatering burger with a juicy beef patty and melted cheese.Ingredients: Beef patty, cheese, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, mustard.

product.name: Veggie Burger
product.description: A burger filled with fresh avocado for a delicious and healthy option. Ingredients: Veggie patty, avocado, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, mustard.

product.name: Farmer Burger
product.description: A burger with authentic ingredients for a rustic and flavorful experience. Ingredients: Beef patty, bacon, cheddar cheese, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, barbecue sauce.

product.name: Spicy chicken burger
product.description: A burger with a spicy twist, featuring a flavorful chicken patty. Ingredients: Chicken patty, jalapenos, pepper jack cheese, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, chipotle sauce.

product.name: Pepperoni
product.description: A classic and effective choice with delicious pepperoni toppings. Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices, oregano.

product.name: Savoyarde
product.description: A pizza topped with bacon, potatoes, and reblochon cheese for a rich and satisfying flavor. Ingredients: Pizza dough, crème fraîche, bacon, potatoes, reblochon cheese, onions.

product.name: Poivron et bacon
product.description: A pizza with fresh peppers and crispy bacon for a delightful combination of flavors. Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, bacon.

product.name: Végétarienne
product.description: A pizza loaded with fresh vegetables and topped with a delicious egg. Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, egg.

product.name: Chicken
product.description: A pizza with grilled chicken and a medley of vegetables for a satisfying and flavorful option. Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, grilled chicken, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms.

product.name: Méditéranéenne
product.description: A pizza with ham, mushrooms, olives, and arugula for a taste of the Mediterranean. Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, mushrooms, olives, arugula.

product.name: Frites originales
product.description: Our fries are made from French potatoes, ensuring an original and delicious taste. Ingredients: Potatoes, salt.

product.name: Frites au cheddar
product.description: These fries are doubly delicious, with a generous topping of melted cheddar cheese. Ingredients: Potatoes, salt, cheddar cheese.
